div.em: Current conditions as of 22 Apr 06:56 am CDT

div.div: A chance of showers and thunderstorms. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 65. East southeast wind 6 to 15 mph becoming north northeast in the afternoon. Chance of precipitation is 50%.
Mostly cloudy, then gradually becoming clear, with a low around 43. North northeast wind 5 to 9 mph becoming west northwest after midnight.
Increasing clouds, with a high near 77. West wind 5 to 8 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph.
